info.title: Fiscal Data Service
info.description: A collection of endpoints to retrieve machine-readable datasets from the US Treasury's Fiscal Data Service

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve Daily Treasury Operating Cash Balance
get.summary: Get the daily U.S. Treasury cash balance and related data
get.description: Get the daily U.S. Treasury cash balance and related data

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by record_date (e.g., -record_date for descending)

get.description: Get monthly U.S. Treasury receipts, outlays, and deficit/surplus data

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by record_date (e.g., -record_date for descending)

get.summary: Get U.S. Debt to the Penny
get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve U.S. Debt to the Penny
get.description: Get daily U.S. total public debt outstanding

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by record_date (e.g., -record_date for descending)

get.summary: Get Treasury Reporting Rates of Exchange
get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve Treasury Reporting Rates of Exchange
get.description: Get exchange rates for foreign currencies reported by the U.S. Treasury

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by record_date (e.g., -record_date for descending)

get.summary: Get Monthly Statement of Public Debt (MSPD)
get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve Monthly Statement of Public Debt (MSPD)
get.description: Get monthly U.S. public debt and security class breakdown

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by record_date (e.g., -record_date for descending)

get.summary: Get U.S. Government Financial Report – Net Cost
get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve U.S. Government Financial Report – Net Cost
get.description: Get annual net cost details for U.S. government agencies

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by record_date (e.g., -record_date for descending)

get.summary: Get Interest Expense on the Public Debt
get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve Interest Expense on the Public Debt
get.description: Get monthly and fiscal year-to-date interest expenses on U.S. public debt

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by record_date (e.g., -record_date for descending)

get.description: Get data on gold reserves held by the U.S. Treasury, including location, form, and value

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by record_date (e.g., -record_date for descending)

get.description: Get data on record-setting Treasury security auctions, including highest and lowest rates, bid-to-cover ratios, and offering amounts

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by record_date (e.g., -record_date for descending)

debt_held_public_amt.description: Total debt held by the public

debt_held_public_mil_amt.description: Debt held by the public (in millions)

error.description: Error message describing the internal server issue

month_expense_amt.description: Interest expense for the current month

facility_desc.description: Description of the facility holding the gold

fine_troy_ounce_qty.description: Quantity of gold in fine troy ounces

book_value_amt.description: Book value of the gold reserves in U.S. dollars

security_type.description: Type of Treasury security (e.g., CMBs, Notes, Bonds)

first_auc_date_single_price.description: First auction date of single price auctions

first_auc_date_low_rate.description: First auction date of lowest rate

first_auc_date_high_rate.description: First auction date of highest rate

high_offer_amt.description: Highest offering amount in U.S. dollars

first_auc_date_high_offer.description: First auction date of highest offering

first_auc_date_high_bid_cover.description: First auction date of highest bid-to-cover ratio

restmt_flag.description: Indicates if the data has been restated

gross_cost_bil_amt.description: Gross cost incurred by the agency (in billions)

earned_revenue_bil_amt.description: Earned revenue by the agency (in billions)

subtotal_bil_amt.description: Subtotal cost after revenue deduction (in billions)
